dict.acceptation: 要求，请求；需要；[法]召唤；询问，盘问；
需求；需要；要求，请求；销路；

sent.orig: Products Demand Survey, Vocational Positions Demand Survey, Employees Demand Survey and Clients Demand Survey etc.
sent.trans: 产品需求调查；岗位需求调查；员工需求调查；客户需求调查；顾客需求等调查。

sent.orig: Sales Forecasting focus on independent demand, and Demand Forecasting cover dependent demand besides independent demand.
sent.trans: 销售预测主要考虑了独立需求，而需求预测既考量了独立需求，又衡量了非独立需求。

sent.orig: Significant demand is price of commodity total supply and total demand price achieve balanced total demand.
sent.trans: 有效需求是商品总供给价格和总需求价格达到均衡的总需求。

sent.orig: But falling demand, including reduced demand demand for oils, has cut treat trade around the world.
sent.trans: 但不断下降的需求，包括石油需求的下降，削减了全世界的贸易。

sent.orig: Investment demand and consumer demand make up of the main content of the total demand.
sent.trans: 投资需求和消费需求，是构成总需求的主要部分。
